
## Class : proximal epiphysis of first metacarpal bone

 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0004422
 * *Label* = proximal epiphysis of first metacarpal bone
 * *Definition* = A proximal epiphysis that is part of a metacarpal bone of digit 1 [Automatically generated definition]. [ [database_cross_reference](../../ef/oboInOwl#hasDbXref.md) = OBOL:automatic ]
